All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractActor
    A abstract class that represents any movable objects on the board.
    AbstractTile
    An implementation of the Tile interface, all other tiles object will use the methods within this abstract class.
    Action
    A Action object associates itself with a single action or change that takes place in the game.
    ActionType
    Created to avoid spaghetti code later.
    AudioPlayer
    Deals with sound aspect of the game
    Board
    The Board class containing the map array of tiles.
    ChapsChallenge
    Window of the actual game, Chap's Challenge.
    CsvReader
    Read a CSV file into a 2d ArrayList of strings.
    DeathTile
    The instant death tile on the board, if the player falls on this tile they respawn to their starting point.
    EnemyMove
    The action type of an enemy moving.
    ExitLock
    The lock to the room containing the exit portal, unlocked when the player collects all of the treasures.
    ExitPortal
    The exit portal, which indicates the end goal of a stage
    FreeTile
    The "empty" tile on the board, any actor can move freely onto this tile.
    Fringe
    A fringe used for pathfinding of the stalker enemy.
    Game
    The Game class, which stores all of the game's information and player movement logic.
    Game.DIRECTION  
    HelpScreen
    Help screen that shows the player brief rules and the in-game keybindings.
    InfoField
    The information tile.
    InventoryView
    Shows the player what keys have been collected in their inventory.
    Key
    THe key tile of the game.
    Level
    Storage class for passing the multiple parameter types from loading a level file.
    LevelJsonMaker
    Utility class for creating a level JSON file.
    LevelJsonMakerTest
    Junit test cases for LevelJsonMaker.
    LevelJsonReader
    Utility class for loading a level JSON file and converting it to a Level class.
    LevelJsonReaderTest
    Junit test cases for LevelJsonReader.
    LockedDoor
    The locked door tile of the game Unlocked with the matching key colour.
    Main
    Runs an instance of the game.
    MazeTest
    THe maze module JUnit tests.
    MonkeyTest
    Loads a level and plays it using randomly generated input
    Persistence
    The main module of Persistence.
    PersistenceTest
    Utility class that can be used to turn persistence/level.csv into a level JSON file.
    Player
    The actor that the player is controlling.
    PlayerMove
    The action type of the player moving.
    PlayerTileInteraction
    The action type of the player interacting with a tile.
    Position
    A class containing a x and y position used for any board objects
    Reader
    Reads a json file and pulls all the variables nessercary for the Replayer to run off of.
    RecordAndReplay<E>
    Houses all the methods that will be called by Application to Record and Replay gameplay.
    Recorder
    This handles all the recording that needs to take place in the game.
    Recorder.Change
    Private nested class object stores both the list of actions AND a time stamp to associate itself with.
    Renderer
    This is responsible for displaying the Maze on the screen including all it's tiles, animations and sound effects.
    Renderer.DIRECTION  
    Replayer
    This class is JUST like Reader, Recorder, and Writer.
    SaveJsonMaker
    A class containing the SaveJsonMaker method, a method for creating save files.
    SaveJsonReader
    A class containing the SaveJsonReader method.
    SaveJsonTest  
    Star
    Represents a star to be drawn in the space background of the rendering window.
    StartMenu
    Start menu of the game.
    TestSuite  
    Treasure
    The treasure tile of the game.
    Wall
    The wall tile of the game.
    Writer
    The writer object is responsible for writing all recorded data into a JSON file.
